title: Why voters stand with Donald Trump over controversial 'civil war' impeachment tweets
text:
Amid the hallowed fields around Gettysburg, scene of one of the US Civil War’s most pivotal confrontations, the battle lines have been drawn once again - and most people are standing with Donald Trump.

The president evoked the specter of America’s bloodiest conflict this week as he warned of the consequences of Democrats pursuing impeachment.

In Gettysburg, where there were over 50,000 casualties in 1863, that resonated more than in most places.

As in much of the country two conflicting interpretations of impeachment have taken hold here. Democrats believe Mr Trump committed treason by pressuring Ukraine and China to dig dirt on Joe Biden. But Republicans are equally convinced that Mr Biden...
description: Amid the hallowed fields around Gettysburg, scene of one of the US Civil War’s most pivotal confrontations, the battle lines have been drawn once again - and most people are standing with Donald Trump.
